alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 11 at 11:29PM CDT until March 12 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL PERRY...SOUTHERN FAULKNER AND NORTHERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Little Italy, or 9 miles northwest of Maumelle, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Maumelle... Little Rock AFB... North Little Rock Airport... Mayflower... Little Italy... Gravel Ridge... Morgan... Marche... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Olmstead... Roland in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Gibson... Camp Robinson... Sylvan Hills... McAlmont... Wye Mountain... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
